There blind treatment . In-Vitro Maturation provide viable , safe option woman PCOS attempt pregnancy use Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART ) .
DOC.brief_title: In Vitro Maturation ( IVM ) Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . 10 woman age 1834 inclusive time signing Informed Consent Form . 2 . A diagnosis PCOS primary MD 3 . An Antral Follicular Count ( AFC ) > 12 one ovary least one occasion 4 . A day 3 FSH level < 8 IU/mL 5 . In good general health current medication may confound response study medication . 6 . Desire seek pregnancy actively study period IVFICSI . 7 . A normal uterine cavity must confirm either hydrosonogram hysteroscopy within two year enter study . 8 . Male partner able provide adequate semen sample ejaculation ( TESE ) Exclusion Criteria 1 . Current pregnancy 2 . Patients uncorrected thyroid disease ( define TSH < 0.2 mIU/ML > 5.5 mIU/mL ) . A normal level within last year adequate entry . 3 . Patients poorly control diabetes ( HgB A1C 8.0 ng/dL ) . 4 . Patients enrol simultaneously investigative study require medication , proscribe study medication , limit intercourse , otherwise prevent compliance protocol . 5 . Patients significant anemia ( Hemoglobin < 10 mg/dL ) . 6 . Patients enrol simultaneously investigative study would interfere research study . 7. contraindication use birth control pill ( oral contraceptive ) determine attend physician ( e.g . history thromboembolism estrogendependent malignancy , breast cancer , etc . )
